expedition.evoSearch module¶

class expedition.evoSearch.EvolutionaryExpedition(main_dict, potter, referee=None)¶

Bases: AbstractExpedition

Quasi-Random Structure Search.

Current method is the genetic algorithm implemented in ASE. The general workflow is (create -> collect -> select -> calc -> harvest). Other methods may utilise this workflow as well, nanmely, Monte Carlo, Basin Hopping, Simulated Annealing, and Minima Hopping.

Note

This is only for the population-based exploration now.

collection_params = {'boltz': {'boltzmann': 3.0, 'fmax': 0.5, 'number': [16, 0.2]}, 'selection_tags': ['converged', 'traj'], 'traj_period': 1}¶
creation_params = {'opt_dname': 'tmp_folder', 'opt_fname': 'opt-ads.xyz', 'struc_prefix': 'cand'}¶
name = 'evo'¶

class expedition.md.MDBasedExpedition(main_dict, potter, referee=None)¶

brute-force molecular dynamics biased molecular dynamics
